title: Genetic material in prokaryotes vs eukaryotes 1

content.description:
Directions: Answers must be in essay form. Outline form is not acceptable. Labeled diagrams may be used to supplement discussion, but in no case will a diagram alone suffice. It is important that you read each question completely before you begin.

A difference between prokaryotes and eukaryotes is seen in the organization of their genetic material.
content.question: Discuss the organization of the genetic material in prokaryotes and eukaryotes.

frqParts.text: Discuss the organization of the genetic material in prokaryotes and eukaryotes.
